entities.name: bludger
entities.description: The Bludger is a type of ball used in Quidditch that is known to be heavy and difficult to control. It is described as 'fierce' and 'heavy'. The text states that the rogue Bludger was unable to change direction quickly.

relationships.description: Harry Potter is avoiding a fierce dive from the Bludger. The text states that Harry 'ran up his nostrils as he hung upside down, avoiding another fierce dive from the Bludger'.
